nodes.Description:
CWE-834: Excessive Iteration
The product performs an iteration or loop without sufficiently limiting the number of times that the loop is executed.
nodes.label: Excessive Iteration

nodes.Description:
CWE-776: Improper Restriction of Recursive Entity References in DTDs ('XML Entity Expansion')
The product uses XML documents and allows their structure to be defined with a Document Type Definition (DTD), but it does not properly control the number of recursive definitions of entities.
nodes.label: Improper Restriction of Recursive Entity References in DTDs ('XML Entity Expansion')

nodes.Description:
CWE-674: Uncontrolled Recursion
The product does not properly control the amount of recursion that takes place, consuming excessive resources, such as allocated memory or the program stack.
nodes.label: Uncontrolled Recursion

nodes.Description:
CWE-835: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop')
The product contains an iteration or loop with an exit condition that cannot be reached, i.e., an infinite loop.
nodes.label: Loop with Unreachable Exit Condition ('Infinite Loop')

nodes.Description:
CWE-1322: Use of Blocking Code in Single-threaded, Non-blocking Context
The product uses a non-blocking model that relies on a single threaded process for features such as scalability, but it contains code that can block when it is invoked.
nodes.label: Use of Blocking Code in Single-threaded, Non-blocking Context
